Row.Text: Dammit all! You...you fuckin'...*sniff*...you fuckin'...[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR:127:127:127:255](She tries to finish her insult, but she just breaks down in tears.)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]My Lowee...p-please don't burn down my Lowee...I know I've said some awful stuff to you, and I'm not asking you to spare me, but please don't hurt my people or burn down the mushrooms...

Yo. Welcome to Lowee. "Land of White Serenity" or somethin' like that. Anyway, I'm White Heart, CPU of this place. Let's get one thing straight: do not piss me off by being a stupid asshole. Follow that rule and we'll be cool!
Hey, buddy. How's it goin'? Good, I hope!
You cold? C'mon, suck it up, ya big baby! Now, what did you wanna talk about?
What up?
Hey. What'cha doing here?
Fuck do you want? You're really startin' to piss me off!
Fucking really? I'm about to tear you a new asshole, then!
Tch. I know my forces aren't as strong as yours, but don't think you're gonna get through this without me fucking up at least SOME of your shit!
...jeez. You're too pathetic for me to even get pissed at. Whatever, I'm going to crush you.
Whoa, sounds like fun! I've been itchin' to bash some heads in! Bring it on, then, fuckstick!
I'm the CPU of Lowee! I don't give a flying rat's fuck what the size of your army is, I'll pulverize all of them myself!
Oh, man, you're funny! A real goddamn comedian! C'mere, let me play Whack-a-Mole with what few soldiers you've got for me to play it with!

Alright, shithead. Enough's enough -- I'm telling everyone else what a little bitch you are.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
...[NEWLINE][COLOR:127:127:127:255](You hear an odd noise. Is that...the sound of teeth grinding? That loudly? You are overwhelmed with a sense of dread!)[ENDCOLOR]
What in the fuck are you saying about me?! Oooh, you are going to regret that, and HARD.

Our people are now buying your blue jeans and listening to your pop music.[NEWLINE]What in the fuck am I supposed to do now? The exposed thighs on my outfit were one of the only sexy parts about it! Now how the hell am I supposed to keep up with the others in terms of looks?!
Alright, asshole. It's go time. You and me, right now. Don't be scared, pussy! Let's go!
Alright, asshole. It's go time. You and me, right now. Don't be scared, pussy! Let's go!
This wasn't too bad of a deal. Wanna keep it goin'?
Good shit.
Right on.
Man, you're great. Everyone oughta be more like you!
Man, you're great. Everyone oughta be more like you!
Fuckin' right! Appreciate it.
I already fuckin' said no. You're starting to get on my nerves.
Yo. I hate to do this, but shit, I'm in a bad situation. You think you could spare this for me and my countrymen? I'd be, like, WAY in your debt if you did. C'mon, whaddaya say?
This ain't working out for me anymore. We gotta do better than this if you wanna keep it going.
Can't afford that. Glad my first party support's so damn good!
How about that? Hard to resist an offer like that, eh?
Not happening, buddy. Sorry.
Ahh, yes, you and I are about to crush {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} into a fucking mess of organs and blood![NEWLINE]

Jeez, your military is insane! I'm feelin' pretty jealous right now. I hate feeling smaller than others![NEWLINE]..."You must be feeling hateful all the time?" Buddy, you better be damn glad I like you right now.
Goddamn at the money you're rakin' in! And I thought our products printed money! Sheesh...
Here's hoping you get beaten in that war of yours, asshole!
Havin' fun fighting? I hope so! Anyway, what's up?
Man, must be emasculating to realize that you're even smaller than me![NEWLINE]...y'know, metaphorically speaking.
I will only warn you once. If you plan on doing to Lowee the same thing you've done to those other countries, you will be sorry.
You're friends with {1_CivName} now? Good shit! Now, let's play Lowee's national party game together sometime![NEWLINE]...wait, let's not. That does nothing but ruin friendships.
I don't know what drove you to declare your cooperation with {1_CivName}, but seriously...what a dumb move.
Buddy, I like you. Whaddaya say we announce to the world that we're workin' together? Nobody'll fuck with us anymore!

Yo, you wanna get in on a fight between me and {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}? Together, we can beat the hell out of them and take whatever we want from them![NEWLINE]...look, they pissed me the fuck off, alright?! I'm not just doing this out of idle cruelty!
Jeez, what kind of monster are you? I don't even want to fuck with you anymore...
Yeah, sure. Whaddaya want?
Welp, I'm out of Loweebos. You're gonna have to go get scalped at online retailers if you want those. But I've got all this other nice stuff!

One of your spies was caught sneaking around in Lowee. The sneezing and chattering teeth gave them away. I suppose we'll have to update our nation's firmware to prevent illicit activities...but anyway, care to explain yourself?

One of your spies was caught sneaking around in Lowee. The sneezing and chattering teeth gave them away. I suppose we'll have to update our nation's firmware to prevent illicit activities...but anyway, care to explain yourself?

Would you like to sign a Research Agreement? You may think Lowee tends to fall behind other nations in terms of advancement, but we just decide to go in different directions than most. I feel it would benefit you to learn more about our research and development.
Would you like to exchange embassies? Just be sure the one you build in Lowee is well insulated...oh, and give it a mushroom cap.
Would you like to exchange embassies? Just be sure the one you build in Lowee is well insulated...oh, and give it a mushroom cap.
Would you like to sign an Open Borders agreement? I feel our third-party support is a bit too weak, so...
Would you like to sign an Open Borders agreement? I feel our third-party support is a bit too weak, so...
I don't know if your continued expansion is a subtle jab at my...lacking size, but I would suggest you stop. Or I'll get mad.
I don't know if your continued expansion is a subtle jab at my...lacking size, but I would suggest you stop. Or I'll get mad.
